```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(pdftools)
library(tesseract)
library(stringr)
library(rlist)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# extracting data
data <- pdf_data("./data/armor-da-pam-600-3-a-2.pdf")

# establishing MOS
MOS <- "Armor"

# we want pages 3-9

pages3to9 <- list.rbind(data[3:9])
pages3to9sep <- as.character(pages3to9$text)
fulltext <- paste(pages3to9sep, collapse = " ")
```

```{r}
# find all of our KD paragraphs
KDs <- str_extract_all(fulltext, "(Key)(\\h)(developmental).*?(?=\\h[a-z]\\.\\h)|(KD).*?(?=\\h[a-z]\\.\\h)")
KDs
```
